com.comphenix.xp.history

Interface HistoryService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HawkeyeService, LogBlockService, MemoryService

    public interface HistoryService
extends Service
    Represents a store of previous player actions.
    Author:
    Kristian

    • Method Detail

      • getLookupSpeed

        HistoryService.LookupSpeed getLookupSpeed()
        Retrieve the lookup (read) speed.
        Returns:
        How quickly values can be read from this service.

      • hasFalsePositives

        boolean hasFalsePositives()
        Whether or not this service may return false positives.

        If it does, HistoryProviders may decide to inquire other services, if at all possible.

        Returns:
        TRUE if this service returns false positives, FALSE otherwise.

      • hasFalseNegatives

        boolean hasFalseNegatives()
        Whether or not this service returns false negatives.
        Returns:
        TRUE if this service returns false negatives, FALSE otherwise.

      • hasPlayerHistory

        java.lang.Boolean hasPlayerHistory(org.bukkit.Location blockLocation)
                                   throws HistoryException
        Determines whether or not a block has been placed by a player.

        A service should return NULL if it cannot decide on a value, OR report that its return values always probabilistic (using hasFalsePositives() or hasFalseNegatives()).

        Parameters:
        blockLocation - - location of the block in question.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the given block was placed by a player, FALSE if it was placed naturally, NULL if uknown.
        Throws:
        HistoryException
